availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a coal boatman in Louisville in 1860. Served in company D of the 1st Battalion of the Louisville Provost Guard during the Civil War. Convicted of attempted robbery in the Jefferson Circuit Court in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 2, page 232.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, M397, 0471. https://www.fold3.com/image/232306715 accessed 05/22/2017.
